About Don't Go Outside

Created by Mattison Brown, Aris Fryer, John Knotts, and Luke Knotts

Don't Go Outside is an interactive novel inspired by the Choose Your Own Adventure books. Below are some of the people who contributed to Don't Go Outside. This project took us all a while, and is still kinda a work in progress. Thank you for taking a look at the things we're up to.

Check out the Game! Help Page

Credits!

Luke Knotts (Desing, Writting, Coding, Music, Art) is a creative type who enjoys making things. They have led development on this game, being helped by some cool people.

"I want to add something important to this world that makes a meaningful difference."

Mattison Brown (Graphics, Art), drew up all of the graphics that Luke edited and put into the game. Their art skills are why this game has some sick pics!!

"Idk I can think about it"

Aris Fryer (Music), is a composer and game developer. Aris produced the entire soundtrack, and wrote almost all of it as well.

"idk what i want on my description yet"

John Knotts (Coding, Design), taught Luke how to code the entirety of this game. And when it came to the advanced stuff, John handled those very well.

"Ha! Nice"

Elkan Lee (Writing), contributed ideas that eventually led to one of the main stories in Don't Go Outside.

"don't get stuck in the past!"

Nathan Branch (0), had some ideas that were incorporated into this game. The have cool ideas.

"You don't need to credit me"
